task.title: Attach the drive to the system
task.shortdesc: The drive needs to be attached to power cables and other cables inside the computer.

prereq.note: You must be grounded before doing this.

step.cmd: Find an empty bay for your drive.
Remove the drive from its electrostatic bag.
Screw the drive in to the frame.
Attach the multi-colored power cord to the drive.
Attach the cable that connects your hard drive to the motherboard.
